title: The Naming of Cats - Novel Updates
tags: Anti-social Protagonist   Character Growth   Cohabitation   Discrimination   Doctors   Glasses-wearing Protagonist   Heartwarming   Language Barrier   Living Alone   Loner Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Near-Death Experience   Past Trauma   Prostit**es   Short Story
author: 芥末君
description:
'Time spent with cats is never wasted.'

Kuze found a cat.

It was a dirty stray cat, with tangled hairs and hard lumps that couldn’t be seen clearly whether it was mud or blood scabs. Just after a sharp bend in the mountain road, he saw it lying on its side, half buried in the snow near the side of the cliff.>
